name: HemoglobinBloodSerumPlasmaMolesPerVolume
title: Hemoglobin Blood Serum Plasma Moles per Volume
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab tests commonly used to measure hemoglobin done on a source of blood, serum or plasma with a reporting scale of moles/volume. These codes are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum or plasma for hemoglobin.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Laboratory, Result or Laboratory, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hemoglobin lab tests using the source of blood/serum/plasma with a reporting scale of moles/volume using LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Do not include any codes or concepts which do not represent hemoglobin as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
